DeprecatedListenersListenerJDBC

Please replace with JdbcTableListener for ease of configuration and improved manageability

Since: 7.6.0

Database Listener that operates on a table having at least a key and a status field.
See also
Github - JdbcQueryListener Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.jdbc.JdbcQueryListener
Syntax
Copy
<JdbcQueryListener selectQuery="" updateStatusToProcessedQuery=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
selectQuery	text	-
Query that returns a row to be processed. Must contain a key field and optionally a message field.
updateStatusToProcessedQuery	text	-
SQL statement to set the status of a row to 'processed'. Must contain one parameter, that is set to the value of the key
Option
